name: AttemptTo: FollowPath
description:
AttemptTo: FollowPath is a short puzzle game where an AI player attempts to replicate your movements, and if not possible, goes in the closest direction.

I recommend experimenting a bit in the first level to get used to the mechanic, as it can be a bit confusing.

The game has 10 main levels + extra collectibles for a challenge.

Made for WOWIE Game Jam 4.
